languages.text: С омерзительной проницательностью мон-кай находит мое слабое место — точку под плечами, где гемункул срастил крылья с моей природной плотью. Удары в нервные узлы заставляют меня ослепнуть от боли и ненависти. Жертва валит меня наземь и начинает колотить сводом моего удлиненного черепа о камни. Я слышу хруст, и тело прекращает слушаться меня.

It is with disgusting insight that the mon-keigh locates my vulnerability, the spot under my shoulders where the Haemonculus joined the wings to my natural flesh. The blows to the ganglia make me go blind with pain and hatred. The Prey rolls me to the ground and starts pounding the arch of my elongated skull against the rocks. I hear a crunch and my body stops responding.
languages.original_text: С омерзительной проницательностью мон-кай находит мое слабое место — точку под плечами, где гемункул срастил крылья с моей природной плотью. Удары в нервные узлы заставляют меня ослепнуть от боли и ненависти. Жертва валит меня наземь и начинает колотить сводом моего удлиненного черепа о камни. Я слышу хруст, и тело прекращает слушаться меня.

traits.locale_text: It is with disgusting insight that the mon-keigh locates my weakness — the spot under my shoulders where the Haemonculus joined the wings to my natural flesh. The blows to the nerve knots make me go blind with hatred an pain. The Prey rolls me to the ground and starts pounding the arch of my elongated skull against the rocks. I hear a crunch, and my body stops responding.
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: モン＝ケイは、ぞっとするような洞察力で、私の弱点、つまりハモンキュラスが私の生来の肉に翼を接合した肩の下の小さな穴を見つけた。神経節に一撃を食らい、痛みと憎しみで目がくらんだ。獲物は私を地面に転がし、細長くなった頭蓋骨のアーチを岩に叩きつけ始めた。バリバリと音がして、私の体は反応しなくなる。
languages.original_text: It is with disgusting insight that the mon-keigh locates my vulnerability, the spot under my shoulders where the Haemonculus joined the wings to my natural flesh. The blows to the ganglia make me go blind with pain and hatred. The Prey rolls me to the ground and starts pounding the arch of my elongated skull against the rocks. I hear a crunch and my body stops responding.

traits.locale_text: モン＝ケイは、ぞっとするような洞察力で、私の弱点、つまりハモンキュラスが私の生来の肉に翼を接合した肩の下の小さな穴を見つけた。神経節に一撃を食らい、痛みと憎しみで目がくらんだ。獲物は私を地面に転がし、細長くなった頭蓋骨のアーチを岩に叩きつけ始めた。バリバリと音がして、私の体は反応しなくなる。
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: 那只该死的猴子眼睛很尖，发现了我的弱点。那里是我肩膀下面的地方，也是血伶人将我的翅膀和血肉连接在一起的地方。猎物猛地击中了我的神经节，剧烈的痛苦让我目不视物。随后，猎物将我推倒在地，抓住我细长的头，朝石头上猛撞。我听到了嘎吱声，身体也停止了反应。
languages.original_text: It is with disgusting insight that the mon-keigh locates my vulnerability, the spot under my shoulders where the Haemonculus joined the wings to my natural flesh. The blows to the ganglia make me go blind with pain and hatred. The Prey rolls me to the ground and starts pounding the arch of my elongated skull against the rocks. I hear a crunch and my body stops responding.

traits.locale_text: 那只猴子发现了我盔甲上的裂缝。那里是我肩膀下面的地方，也是血伶人将我的翅膀和血肉连接在一起的地方。猎物猛地击中了我的神经节，剧烈的痛苦让我目不视物。随后，猎物将我推倒在地，抓住我细长的头，朝石头上猛撞。我听到了嘎吱声，身体也停止了反应。
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: Con asquerosa perspicacia, {mf|el|la} mon-keigh encuentra mi vulnerabilidad, la zona bajo mis hombros donde el Hemónculo unió las alas a mi piel. Los golpes en los ganglios me dejan ciego de dolor y odio. La presa me hace rodar por el suelo y empieza a golpear el arco de mi cráneo alargado contra las rocas. Oigo un crujido y mi cuerpo deja de responder.
languages.original_text: It is with disgusting insight that the mon-keigh locates my vulnerability, the spot under my shoulders where the Haemonculus joined the wings to my natural flesh. The blows to the ganglia make me go blind with pain and hatred. The Prey rolls me to the ground and starts pounding the arch of my elongated skull against the rocks. I hear a crunch and my body stops responding.

traits.locale_text: Con asquerosa perspicacia, {mf|el|la} mon-keigh encuentra mi punto débil, la zona bajo mis hombros donde el Hemónculo unió las alas a mi piel. Los golpes en los ganglios me dejan ciego de dolor. La presa me hace rodar por el suelo y empieza a golpear el arco de mi cráneo alargado contra las rocas. Oigo un crujido y mi cuerpo deja de responder.
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: Mit widerwärtiger Scharfsinnigkeit entdeckt der Chem-Pan-Sey meine Verwundbarkeit, den Punkt unter meinen Schultern, an dem der Haemonculus die Flügel an meinem natürlichen Fleisch befestigt hat. Die Hiebe gegen die Ganglien machen mich blind vor Hass und Schmerz. Die Beute rollt mich auf den Boden und beginnt, meinen länglichen Kopf gegen die Steine zu schlagen. Ich höre ein Knacken und mein Körper reagiert nicht mehr.
languages.original_text: It is with disgusting insight that the mon-keigh locates my vulnerability, the spot under my shoulders where the Haemonculus joined the wings to my natural flesh. The blows to the ganglia make me go blind with pain and hatred. The Prey rolls me to the ground and starts pounding the arch of my elongated skull against the rocks. I hear a crunch and my body stops responding.

traits.locale_text: Mit widerwärtiger Scharfsinnigkeit entdeckt der Chem-Pan-Sey meine Schwachstelle, den Punkt unter meinen Schultern, wo der Haemonculus die Flügel an meinem natürlichen Fleisch befestigt hat. Durch die Treffer auf die Ganglien werde ich blind vor Verachtung und Schmerz. Die Beute rollt mich auf den Boden und beginnt, meinen länglichen Kopf gegen die Steine zu schlagen. Ich höre ein Knacken und mein Körper reagiert nicht mehr.
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: {mf|Le|La} mon-keigh repère avec sagacité mon point faible, juste sous mes épaules, là où l'hémoncule a fusionné les ailes à ma chair naturelle. La douleur du coup qu'{mf|il|elle} me porte au ganglion m'aveugle, et la proie en profite pour me jeter à terre et marteler mon crâne contre les rochers. J'entends un craquement et mon corps cesse de répondre.
languages.original_text: It is with disgusting insight that the mon-keigh locates my vulnerability, the spot under my shoulders where the Haemonculus joined the wings to my natural flesh. The blows to the ganglia make me go blind with pain and hatred. The Prey rolls me to the ground and starts pounding the arch of my elongated skull against the rocks. I hear a crunch and my body stops responding.

traits.locale_text: {mf|Le|La} mon-keigh repère avec sagacité la fente dans mon armure, juste sous mes épaules, là où l'hémoncule a fusionné les ailes à ma chair naturelle. La douleur du coup qu'{mf|il|elle} me porte au ganglion m'aveugle, et la proie en profite pour me jeter à terre et marteler mon crâne contre les rochers. J'entends un craquement et mon corps cesse de répondre.
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: Mon-keigh, mide bulandırıcı bir zekâ örneği göstererek zayıf noktamı tespit ediyor: Haimonkulus'un kanatlarımı doğal bedenimle birleştirdiği, omuzlarımın altındaki nokta. Sinir düğümüne vurduğu darbeler, acı ve nefretle gözümü kör ediyor. Avım beni yere seriyor, uzatılmış kafatasımın kemerini kayalara vurmaya başlıyor. Bir çatırtı duyuyorum. Bedenim tepki vermeyi bırakıyor.
languages.original_text: It is with disgusting insight that the mon-keigh locates my vulnerability, the spot under my shoulders where the Haemonculus joined the wings to my natural flesh. The blows to the ganglia make me go blind with pain and hatred. The Prey rolls me to the ground and starts pounding the arch of my elongated skull against the rocks. I hear a crunch and my body stops responding.

traits.locale_text: Mon-keigh mide bulandırıcı bir zekâ örneği göstererek zayıf noktamı tespit ediyor: Haimonkulus'un kanatlarımı doğal bedenimle birleştirdiği, omuzlarımın altındaki nokta. Sinir düğümüne vurduğu darbeler, acı ve nefretle gözümü kör ediyor. Av beni yere seriyor ve uzatılmış kafatasımın kemerini, kayalara vurmaya başlıyor. Bir çatırtı duyuyorum ve bedenim tepki vermeyi bırakıyor.
traits.speaker: Player
